snippet: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority presented two plans for more expensive pay-per-ride MetroCards.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority releases plans for higher fares and tolls as part of its long-term revenue plans; authority has scheduled eight public hearings in city and suburbs to solicit response from riders and drivers about proposed 4 percent rise, which MTA officials say is lower than planned because of improved financial outlook.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority presented two plans for more expensive pay-per-ride MetroCards.

headline.main: M.T.A. Issues Plans on Higher Fares and Tolls
headline.print_headline: M.T.A. Issues Plans on Higher Fares and Tolls
